name: Shogun Bloodlines
description:
"Big Trouble in a Little World" The struggle between Light & Darkness has always swayed within the balance of time, but with the Rise of a New Evil Shogun the course of history may forever be covered in Shadows. Will you be the World’s last chance for Peace and take on the role as the sole Survivor of the Hanzo Clan? Embark on an epic adventure through an Open World rebuilding your Clan to Seal the Broken Spirit Stones, overthrow the Corrupt Daimyo, and ultimately Defeat the Evil Shogun.  Name your Character     12 Classes      Evolving Story      Rebuild your Clan     Multiple Islands      Quest Log     Side Jobs      Weather     Day to Night      Lights     Running & Jumping     Houses to Buy     Costumes & Outfits   Fishing, Gardening, Sushi Rolling, Brew Coffee, Kung Fu Lessons, Races, Dice Game, Poetry, Fortune Tellers, Wanted posters, Chakra Dash (Extra Info) We provide multiple ways in Shogun Bloodlines to heal your Heroes. Whether you are Sleeping 🏩 in a safe house or Inn, eating delicious Food 🍣, drinking trusty Potions 🍯, or relaying on Spells✨; your Characters will always have the Strength needed to fight Evil.
Houses are not just a safe place to Sleep 💤 and heal up. They also provide you with special ways of using items that you acquire along your travels; like rolling sushi 🍣, brewing coffee 🍵, and planting seeds🌱. You can also change your Hero's outfit 👕 at a dresser or store items in a chest 🔐 for safe keeping. With Houses spread out all over the World you will find that each one comes with unique amenities. Enjoy the relaxation while you can, the Evil Shogun's Troops are Everywhere. Each of the Cities controlled by a Daimyo need liberated, once defeated choose one of the Townsfolk to take control. With 4 choices for each City who will you pick to shape the future of this Little World? Game Controller Recommended Windows Only
